dialogues.text: No choices left, swims up... up... going on thin hope. Lo odds. Trailing blood. Lungs about to burst. JULIE’S P.O.V. Rising up over jagged rocks... the beam of her flashlight catches something strange in the darkness dead ahead. Her own reflection swims straight at her. Julie breaks th surface!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie sucks in a lungfull of centuries-dank air... and immediately begins coughing. She has surfaced in an AIR POCKET somewhere within the cavern. The beam of her flashlight quickly reveals the truth: She has surfaced in a dead end... a_rocky cove the size o coffin. She flashes her light back downwards.

dialogues.speaker: BELOW
dialogues.text: Her tank is solidly wedged in the narrow bottleneck. The swarm’s access is blocked for the time being.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The place is packed, inside the bar and out, standing roo only. Rap/Rock blares. Marcus is a nervous wreck. He sucks down a shot of tequil and SPANKS the bar.

dialogues.speaker: MARCUS
dialogues.text: Carrie, hit me!

dialogues.speaker: CARRIE
dialogues.text: Don’t tempt me. This is a mob scene, Marcus! I should have three back-ups working this bar.  62.

dialogues.speaker: MARCUS
dialogues.text: That’s why I’m lucky to have a pro like you.

dialogues.speaker: CARRIE
dialogues.text: Nice try. (tosses him a bar towel) Get back here and give me a hand.

dialogues.speaker: MARCUS
dialogues.text: What?! !

dialogues.speaker: CARRIE
dialogues.text: You heard me, get to work or I’m walking. Now, Marcus.

dialogues.speaker: MARCUS
dialogues.text: Okay, okay. Rodriguez elbows his way to the bar.

dialogues.speaker: RODRIGUEZ
dialogues.text: The Sheriff’s office just called. We have to clear some of these people or they’1l shut us down.

dialogues.speaker: MARCUS
dialogues.text: Just stall ‘em. Fireworks will start any minute. Some of them will leave. We now see a PATRON turn away from the bar, loaded down w margaritas... it’s Taylor. He makes his way through the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: A TALL BAR TABLE
dialogues.text: Taylor delivers the drinks to J.C., Sydney and Reggie. J.C. Where’s Camille? I thought you said she’d meet us here.

dialogues.speaker: SYDNEY
dialogues.text: Don’t worry, She can take care of herself.

dialogues.speaker: REGGIE
dialogues.text: This is a rip-off. I thought there was supposed to be fireworks.  63.

dialogues.speaker: SYDNEY
dialogues.text: The fireworks are right here, sweet thang. Taylor slides in beside J.C. The rowdy crowd pushes in on them from all sides.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: This place is a zoo. I knowa great little restaurant that serves killer barbecue. Maybe we should slip out for awhile. J.C. (re: Reggie and Syd) They look pretty happy here.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: No, I mean just you and me.

dialogues.speaker: THE STAGE
dialogues.text: Basically a wall of giant speakers and a high tech set of turntables. A local D.J. grabs the mic. D.J. And now... from the stone cold heart of Las Vegas, where paradise is a pair of dice. We bring you Lil John and the Too Live Crew.

dialogues.speaker: THE GIRLS
dialogues.text: J.C. and Sydney watch as the hard core rap crew takes the stage. Taylor takes advantage of the distraction... He drops the small white PILL from Reggie’s aspirin tin into J.C.’s dr

dialogues.speaker: THE STAGE
dialogues.text: LIL’ JOHN, a hard core rapper, his bare chest covered wit jailhouse tats, takes the mic as his D.J. starts spinning turntables. The stack of base woofers BOOM like cannons as Lil’ John begins his rap. The crowd moves to the beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That fracture in the central pylon is no longer “hairline More plaster flakes off as the combination of the dancing the monster subwoofers VIBRATES the entire deck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie is clinging to the rocks, trying to slow her breath Stay calm to survive. She hears a disturbance in the wate beneath her. JULIE’S P.O.V. A Single piranha is squirming through the narrow space between her tank and the passageway. Julie desperately tries to climb higher, but it’s impossi on the slippery moss covered rocks. Trapped. The piranha shoots straight up and breaks the surface lik leaping trout. Julie throws herself to one side. It’s teeth SNAP as it just misses her. The piranha impact the side of the cavern and careens back into the water. Julie begins to hyperventilate, trying desperately to loc the piranha with her flashlight. It could be coming at he from any direction. Her flashlight beam reveals two more wriggling through. T tank SCREECHES against the rocks as it becomes dislodged. The tank drops away into the darkness, and the entire swa surges straight up at Julie. We now hear the most surprising thing of all... a voice. Barely a WHISPER.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE
dialogues.text: This way... Her beam flashes upward, revealing a hidden shelf on the opposite wall of the narrow air space. Julie snags a slippery hand hold and scrambles up as a do piranhas leap up at her heels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rabid piranha fly into the air, SNAPPING at Julie as rolls into the safety of the hidden shelf.  65.

dialogues.speaker: SHELF
dialogues.text: Ted Patterson lies wedged in the tiny alcove just a few f from Julie. He looks frighteningly thin and weak, but he’ alive!

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Ted! Oh my god, Ted... Tears well up in Julie’s eyes. From this closer angle, we can see how tough it is for hi muster the energy to speak.

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: (weak whisper) Julie. How did you...?

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Are you alright?

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: (coughs) I’ve been better... Julie notices his hands are dark with blood and curled in tight fists.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Your hands...

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: I was... I was trying to dig... stupid. The flesh of Ted’s fingers are scraped down to the bone. rock ceiling above him is covered with bloody claw marks.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Can you move?

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: I don’t know. I busted some ribs. Can’t feel my legs. Ted begins coughing again... sounds worse this time. Juli cups some water in her hands and brings it to his lips.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Here. Try to drink. Ted sucks the cool water through blistered lips.  66.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: We’ve got to get out of here. The fish can be heard SPLASHING just below them.

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: Those fucking things... they’re waiting for us. Julie’s voice shakes with emotion; the entire experience catching up with Julie.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: (softly) They killed Jacob right in front of me. Tore him to pieces. I tried to help him, but I couldn’t, I...

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: That’s enough. (pauses) We’ve got to think. Did you see any other way out of here?

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: (shakes her head) Nothing, as far as I can tell. One way in, one way out.

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: Is anyone else with you?

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Zack, Nate... we got seperated.

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: They’11 never find you in here. You’ve got to get back to the entrance.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: (corrects him) We have to get back to the entrance. I’m not going without you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baxter WHINES, pacing back and forth along the length of boat.  67.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last rays of sun dip below the horizon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie pauses as she hears a DISTURBANCE in the water. She trains her light on the pool beneath them.

dialogues.speaker: THE PIRANHA
dialogues.text: Still circling... but one by one they dive downward, returning to the main cavern.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: What’s happening?

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: Nightfall. The swarm leaves the cave as soon as the sun sets. (beat) This is your chance, Julie... you’ve got to take it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It’s a few margaritas later and Sydney is busy arguing wi Reggie about his “lack of commitment.” Taylor leans close J.C. as she finishes her drink.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: You ready to go? J.C. No, I... J.C.’s head bobs as she begins to nod off. J.C. Wow... that was strong. Was that a double? Sydney suddenly jumps up from her seat

dialogues.speaker: SYDNEY
dialogues.text: Hey you guys, look! The fireworks are starting. Everybody looks up as an impressive display of multi-colo fireworks CRACKLES in the early evening sky. The D.J. cra up the music. The crowd rises to their feet.  68. J.C. stumbles as she tries to rise. Taylor swoops right i slinging an arm around her. J.C. (softly) I don’t feel so good...

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: I’ve got you, just relax. J.C. swoons. With her head leaning on Taylor’s shoulder they look just like a normal young couple in love. Taylor glances back at Sydney. She’s still watching the fireworks with Reggie. Taylor pulls J.C. closer.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: C’mon. You need some fresh air He rushes her off through the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted’s growing weaker... can barely speak

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: You’ve got to hurry. Go on. Take my tank. There’s still air in it

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: We’re going together.

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: I’1l just slow you down.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Remember when you told me you'd never leave me alone down here?

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: (smiles weakly) .. yeah.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: That works both ways. Julie braces herself against the rocks and carefully drag Ted into the water beside her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie fumbles for his oxygen bit and secures it in his mo She still has no tank of her own. Ted’s too far gone to argue. Julie hyperventilates with quick short breaths to fill he lungs to capacity, then takes one last long GASP and dive straight down, clutching Ted closely to her side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie swims straight down with all her might. She’s force to go through the bottleneck first, then pull Ted after h Her lungs already aching.

dialogues.speaker: THE CAVERN
dialogues.text: Julie exits the hollow and peels out into the main cavern navigating by the narrow beam of her flashlight. Still no fish in sight. She makes a beeline for the exit... but hits a rocky wall

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As she realizes she’s taken a wrong turn. She desperately flashes her beam around the unfamiliar rock formations.

dialogues.speaker: RIFT ENTRANCE
dialogues.text: Nate finds the rift and swims straight for it... but pull back at the last second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His eyes grow wide and he begins to rapidly hyperventilat We can see that his claustrophobia is suddenly overwhelmi him. NATE’S P.O.V. - THE RIFT A classic Spielberg PUSH IN/ZOOM OUT, vertigo of the narr rift. Only a fool would go in that narrow, nightmarish passage.  70.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie turns, panic stricken, completely disoriented in th vast black limbo of the cavern. She gives up her last gas of oxygen... but still won’t take the bit from Ted. She’s suddenly jerked back... a hand grasps her shoulder It’s Zack, holding her nylon line. Zack takes out his oxy bit and offers it to Julie. She takes a desperately neede gulp of air. Julie “buddy breathes” with Zack as he helps her pull Ted towards the cavern exit.

dialogues.speaker: SHOCK CUT
dialogues.text: A pack of piranhas swirl up out of the darkness directly behind them. Julie and Zack make a break for the entrance, dragging Te with them. The passageway is only twenty yards ahead... The piranhas wheel about and head straight for their victims... picking up speed. Julie, Zack and Ted are going to reach the entrance at exactly the same time as the swarm.

dialogues.speaker: THE PASSAGEWAY
dialogues.text: Nate shoots inside, thrusting a BLAZING FLARE before him. Instantly, the pack scatters from the blinding light But Nate panics, dropping the flare. He’s pushed himself beyond his limits and can barely move. Zack pushes Nate back out the rocky passageway as Julie p Ted along with her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baxter BARKS excitedly as oxygen bubbles break the surfac Nate appears, then Zack and Julie, supporting Ted. They cling to the boat’s aluminum ladder. ZACK. Ted... is he alive?! Julie spits out the mouthpiece, gasping.  71.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: He’s hypothermic. We’ve got to get him to St. Edwards!

dialogues.speaker: NATE
dialogues.text: (climbing up) What happened to Jacob?

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: He’s gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nate’s fallen flare sputters out, leaving the passageway darkness again. The swarm quickly regroups.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The swarm’s point man, THE ALPHA FISH, is a large, battle scarred male with a broken fang. He surges forward, leadi them through the passageway. The entire swarm fans out behind him as they head into th lake in a search and destroy mode. Alpha Fish reacts as he hears a low, rhythmic THRUM. ALPHA FISH P.O.V. This THRUM can actually be seen by Alpha Fish... it appea as a deep, wide RIPPLE in the otherwise even sonar plane the lake bed.

dialogues.speaker: ALPHA FISH
dialogues.text: He swims upward toward the sound, leading the entire swar towards the surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAMERA races along the surface of the lake as the now familiar TURBULENCE appears, the eerie swirling phenomeno that is the sign of the piranha. The shadowy swarm skims along just beneath the surface of the moonlit water. CAMERA BOOMS UP to reveal their destination. The party lights of the Sand Bar’s outdoor deck lie directly in the path of the swarm.  72. The rhythmic THRUM becomes loud and clear... it’s the bas line of Lil’ John’s rap performance as the Fourth of July party heats up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lil’ John is on the mic, working the crowd. LIL’ JOHN (chants) Jump on it! Jump on it! Jump on it! The crowd HOOTS and HOLLERS, jumping in unison to the bea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pylon finally CRACKS wide open. The underside of the deck SHAKES. Dust trickles down. CAMERA BOOMS DOWN to the surface of the water. The pale eyes of the approaching swarm of piranhas are visible, glowing through the dark surface of the water li parade of ghosts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carrie is still trying to serve a sea of customers. Marcu does his best to back her up. Carrie pauses, sensing something...

dialogues.speaker: CARRIE
dialogues.text: Hey... Did you feel that?

dialogues.speaker: MARCUS
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: CARRIE
dialogues.text: I dunno. For a sec I thought it was another earth quake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boat flies across the moonlit water with Zack at the wheel. He’s speaking on the boat’s shortwave radio. Julie sits with Ted, a blanket pulled tightly around his should

dialogues.speaker: ZACK
dialogues.text: (hangs up) There’1l be an ambulance waiting for us at the dock. Julie glances at Ted, who nods weakly.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: He’s going to make it.

dialogues.speaker: NATE
dialogues.text: How did you two survive in there?

dialogues.speaker: ZACK
dialogues.text: They couldn’t stand the light. It was the one thing that backed them off.

dialogues.speaker: NATE
dialogues.text: (pauses... thinking) Light sensitivity only occurs in cave fish, or fish that have evolved in the deepest parts of the ocean. Most of them are nearly blind in the sunlight.

dialogues.speaker: ZACK
dialogues.text: ...that’s why the attacks only happen at night.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: But how could creatures like that turn up in Havasu?

dialogues.speaker: NATE
dialogues.text: That wasn’t just a cavern, it was an underground lake.

dialogues.speaker: ZACK
dialogues.text: A what?

dialogues.speaker: NATE
dialogues.text: A large body of water completely cut off from the outside world. Maybe for centuries. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NATE(cont 'd) They’re not uncommon, especially here in Arizona.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: If that’s true, something had to pen it up. oO

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: (softly) The quake... They all turn to Ted. He’s fully conscious, but his voice still weak.

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: he lake bed collapsed... we were uried alive. oo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It would take an environment that was closed off for centuries, for that kind of creature to evolve.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: What kind of creature Nate? What are they?

dialogues.speaker: NATE
dialogues.text: (pauses) Piranhas.

dialogues.speaker: ZACK
dialogues.text: They’re much larger than piranhas.

dialogues.speaker: NATE
dialogues.text: But they have all the other attributes. The predatorial fangs, the swarm mentality... (beat) If they did evolve in isolation, they could be the progenitors of the entire species.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A secluded spot a short distance from the Sand Bar Spotlights from the party can be seen in the B.G. Occasio FIREWORKS continue.  75. Taylor’s Mercedes pulls down an incline to a stand of wee willows at the end of the pier. The engine and the headlights click off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taylor leans over to J.C. She is slumped in the passenger seat, fading in and out of consciousness. Taylor cautiously runs a hand along her bare arm... cares her. A test to see if she’1l wake up. J.C. moans softly and stirs. Taylor gets more daring with his caress. Leans closer.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: (whispers) Feels good, doesn’t it? You’re so beautiful... The delusional bastard thinks she’s enjoying this! He reaches across and lowers her seat back. It drops down with a CLUNK. J.C. stirs, her eyes half open. Is she going to wake up? Taylor slides across the console and lays on top of J.C.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: (whispers) I know what you want... Taylor nudges her legs apart and kisses her neck. He fumb with the snap of her jeans. J.C.’s eyes flash open. She wakes up, completely disoriented. J.C. What are you...? Taylor!!! But Taylor is committed to getting what he wants.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: Hey, don’t be a little tease... Taylor continues to grope her, getting forceful. J.C. fig back, raking his face with her nails.  76.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three COLLEGE BOYS, jock types, are sharing a joint as th watch the fireworks. They react to J.C’s SCREAM.

dialogues.speaker: JOCK
dialogues.text: (rises) What the hell was that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: J.C. kicks and punches Taylor with all her might.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: You bitch! Taylor is such a punk, he starts to hit her back. He does notice as he BUMPS the gear shift... putting the car in neutral.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they struggle, the big Mercedes slowly rolls down a br incline... and out onto the short pier

dialogues.speaker: COLLEGE JOCKS
dialogues.text: They see the car rolling straight towards the edge of the pier.

dialogues.speaker: JOCKS
dialogues.text: Hey!... Hey! Look out!

dialogues.speaker: THE MERCEDES
dialogues.text: The car is slowly losing momentum... the front wheels go the edge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: J.C. and Taylor both react to the double BUMP as the fron wheels drop. There is a SCREECH of metal on wood as their world tips over towards the water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Mercedes seesaws, then plunges off the edge of the pi with a huge SPLASH!  77.

dialogues.speaker: SAME TIME
dialogues.text: The Alpha Fish turns abruptly at the sound of the splash. The vast formation behind him follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Mercedes bobs back up and drifts out into the lake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taylor finally realizes what’s happened. The water line i already halfway up the windows and rising.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: My car! You stupid bitch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The swarm is on the move, wheeling about, swirling toward the sinking Mercedes.

dialogues.speaker: SHORE
dialogues.text: The Jocks splash into the water. The car is only a few ya further than the pier.

dialogues.speaker: JOCK
dialogues.text: (to Jock #3) Get some help. As Jock #3 hurries off, Jocks #1 and #2 wade straight out towards the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The car is quickly sinking; the waterline continues its steady rise up the windows.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: Shit... my Dad’s gonna kill me. J.C. tries the door, but it’s held shut by the external pressure of the water. Her attempts grow more frantic.  78.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: Hey, chill out, okay? The water’s not that deep. The pressure will equalize in a couple of minutes. J.C. notices that rushing water is quickly filling up the through the air vents. The two Jocks appear, up to their chests in the water. J. can see them above the split waterline as the car continu to sink.

dialogues.speaker: JOCK
dialogues.text: Hey! You okay in there?

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: Fuck off! We’re fine. As J.C. watches, a strange SURFACE TURBULENCE rushes at t Jocks from behind. A swirling SHADOW darkens her view bel the surface. The foremost Jock is struck by an invisible force so hard he’s spun around... but he’s still standing, a surprised on his face. The Jock raises his arms above the waterline... revealing bare, splintered bones sticking up from two bloody stumps The water now EXPLODES into churning hell and both Jocks pulled under.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: (gasps) . What the hell’s happening? The waterline continues to rise as the Mercedes sinks... inches of air space visible along the top of the windows. The interior water is three feet deep and rising.

dialogues.speaker: WINDOWS
dialogues.text: The murky water surrounding the car is now washed by a DE RED... reducing visibility from bad to zero. J.C. can no longer see anything through the bloody red wa It is deathly quiet until...

dialogues.speaker: CLACK
dialogues.text: Multiple piranha hit the glass, their deadly teeth mashed against the window, SNAPPING inches from J.C.’s face. She SCREAMS.  79. CLACK! CLACK! CLACK! CLACK! CLACK! Dozens more swim into glass, literally covering every inch of surface... CAMERA REVOLVES around J.C., a terrifying 360 degree view of the nightmarish attack. At the same moment, the interior is rapidly flooding, reaching the dash. Hundreds of SNAPPING mouths fight for position at the windows. J.C. screams.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: Shut up!!! I’m trying to think Taylor stabs at a button on the dash... the sun roof! It’ still just above the surface of the water, but it doesn’t open. Taylor cranks the keys in the ignition. The interior ligh BLINK ON, then instantly short out.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: Shit!!!! He stabs the button again... And the sun roof smoothly WH open, revealing fireworks in the starlit sky.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: (smiles) Yes! German craftsmanship... Taylor scrambles up out of the sun roof. J.C. hurries aft him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taylor and J.C. pull themselves up onto the roof of the sinking mercedes. The water around them churns with piran as the grisly bones of Jocks #1 and #2 bob up to the surf The shadow of the swarm is immense, swirling around the c on all sides. J.C. What are they?!

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: Seriously pissed off fish... They balance on the roof as the slippery blood-darkened w inches up on them. Taylor pulls open the blade of a pearl-handled penknife. Looks crazy, but it’s his only defense.  80. J.C. gazes at the churning water, scared out of her sense A light appears out on the darkness of the lake. It’s the Looking Glass! J.C. A boat! (calls to boat) Hey, over here!

dialogues.speaker: THE LOOKING GLASS
dialogues.text: Zack is at the helm. He’s still far away, but he spots th ANGLE ON TAYLOR AND J.C. The water washes over their feet... floods down through t sun roof.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: Shit!!!  They’re not going to get here in time. The car slowly starts to tilt, rolling over in the water. J.C. and Taylor balance as best they can. J.C. You think we can swim fast enough? Taylor gets a crazy look in his eyes. He suddenly grabs J.C.’s wrist and cuts deeply across her forearm with the penknife. Blood wells up.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: Now I only have to swim faster than you. He shoves J.C. into the water

dialogues.speaker: THE LOOKING GLASS
dialogues.text: Zack reacts as he sees the young girl thrown into the wat

dialogues.speaker: ZACK
dialogues.text: My god. Zack turns to Julie, who sits in the back of the boat wit blanket wrapped around Ted’s shoulders.

dialogues.speaker: ZACK
dialogues.text: Hang on! Zack slams the throttle forward. Nate is thrown off his f and lands hard on the deck.  81.

dialogues.speaker: THE ROOF OF THE MERCEDES
dialogues.text: Taylor dives out as far as he can from the car. The Merce sinks from sight with an eruption of bubbles. UNDERWATER - J.C. The circle of piranha surges inward, striking at J.C... b J.C. swims under the sinking car.

dialogues.speaker: SONAR VISION
dialogues.text: J.C.’s SILHOUETTE merges with the shape of the car, causi her to disappear as she swims beneath it’s chassis.

dialogues.speaker: CAR
dialogues.text: The piranhas’ attack dissolves into confusion as J.C. swi the length of the chassis and comes up the other side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wheels about, scanning for her. But the formation of f behind him has broken up into a feeding frenzy.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: Taylor swims for his life. He only slows down to make sur the boat sees him.

dialogues.speaker: TAYLOR
dialogues.text: (waves) Please, help!!! J.C. surfaces a short distance behind him, swimming like Qlympic athlete! Taylor can’t believe his eyes. He gets back into the race swimming for all he’s worth. EXT. UNDERWATER - ALPHA FISH P.O.V. The piranha’s sonar focuses up on two nice loud targets SPLASHING away in unison; J.C. and Taylor.

dialogues.speaker: ZACK
dialogues.text: He’s astonished to see the TURBULENCE closing in on Taylo and J.C.  82.

dialogues.speaker: ZACK
dialogues.text: (to Julie) Take the wheel!

dialogues.speaker: J.C.
dialogues.text: She’s swimming all out... then we hear her knee POP as sh snap kicks. J.C. winces in pain.

dialogues.speaker: THE LOOKING GLASS
dialogues.text: Nate takes hold of Ted as Julie springs forward and grabs wheel.

dialogues.speaker: ZACK
dialogues.text: Cut it as close to her as you can.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: What are you...? Zack races to the back of the boat. CLOSER - J.C. She digs into the water fighting the pain, powered by fea what’s behind her... and outrage at the bastard ahead of She slowly gains on Taylor. Taylor and J.C. are neck and neck. The TURBULENCE is righ on top of them, no more than a few feet and closing fast. J.C. grabs Taylor’s ponytail and jerks back with all her might. Taylor SCREAMS like a little girl. J.C. swims righ over him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She’s gained a few yards, but the piranha close in for th kill. The TURBULENCE steam rolls over Taylor, who’s pulle down, SHRIEKING in agony.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zack hooks a foot in a wide SLALOM SKI in the aft of the boat, grabs a coil of tow rope and leaps out into the boa wake. Zack hits hard, shooting up a wall of spray... but he han on and rises up out of the water. Julie bears down on the throttle, heading straight for J. Zack quickly shoots up over the wake, sails through mid a and lands wide of the boat.  83. J.C. She’s swimming for all she’s worth, BUT THE CHURNING WATE

dialogues.speaker: ZACK
dialogues.text: Leans into the water in a full horizontal. He plows strai into the swarm at full speed. A wall of water explodes up. Looks like a wipe out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then Zack pulls free, surfacing with one arm wrapped arou J.C., the other still hanging onto the tow rope! He cheated the swarm a split second before it would have stripped J.C. to the bone.

dialogues.speaker: THE LOOKING GLASS
dialogues.text: Julie pulls them to safety, then loops the boat around in u-turn to pick them up. She cuts the boat’s engines. Nate scrambles to the rear of the boat as Zack scrambles up th short ladder with J.C. Nate pulls J.C. in. She collapses to the floor, still wid eyed and panting hard. She grasps her knee in pain. Zack kneels down beside J.C. on the floor of the glass bo boat.

dialogues.speaker: ZACK
dialogues.text: (softly) Take it easy, you’re safe now.

dialogues.speaker: SHOCK CUT
dialogues.text: Taylor’s bloody face appears inches from J.C. pressed up against the glass... still alive! He pounds his fists on the glass as the piranha rip his f from his bones. Zack pulls J.C. to the gunnel. When they look back, Taylo remains are being dragged down into the darkness by the swarm... gone for good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lil’ John is joined on stage by the rest of his crew as t hip hop CHANT reaches a crescendo. The crowd jumps to the pounding beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rodriguez is doing his best to please Sheriff Dobbs. Dobb is backed up by two of his deputies.

dialogues.speaker: DOBBS
dialogues.text: We’re shutting you down. I want these people out of here, now.

dialogues.speaker: RODRIGUEZ
dialogues.text: Sheriff, I’m sure there must be... Sheriff Dobbs and his deputies react to a loud off camera screech of rending wood.

dialogues.speaker: PYLONS
dialogues.text: The central pylon TEARS LOOSE and the entire deck finally breaks free with a terrifying SCREECH of wood and metal.

dialogues.speaker: PARTY
dialogues.text: The deck tips down at a gut-wrenching angle sending a wav partygoesrs sliding across the dance floor... several hit rail and flip over into the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: BAR DOORWAY
dialogues.text: The Sheriff races out and is taken by surprise by the sha angle of the deck. His feet shoot out from under him and slides straight down into the darkness, past SCREAMING patrons clinging to the wreckage.

dialogues.speaker: THE WATER
dialogues.text: Sheriff Dobbs SPLASHES down in a spray of water. He surfaces, shocked, GASPING for air. SHERIFF’S P.O.V. Dozens of piranha leap up out of the water, teeth FLASHIN  85. EXT. UNDERWATER - TAYLOR’S CARCASS Hundreds of piranha fight for the last morsels. Alpha Fish drifts up into the foreground, chomping down a of Taylor’s flesh. He hears the sound of MULTIPLE SPLASHE and surges forward with deadly purpose. The swarm accelerates like a whirling tornado and streams after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marcus clutches the bar and hangs on as drinks slide by h

dialogues.speaker: SYDNEY
dialogues.text: Grabs her high bar table, which is bolted to the floor... Reggie slides straight down into the tangle of partygoers slides SCREAMING off the deck. He hits the rail at full speed, SMASHES straight through it.

dialogues.speaker: THE WATER
dialogues.text: Reggie tumbles downward and SPLASHES into the water with dozens of other partiers.

dialogues.speaker: SYDNEY
dialogues.text: She SCREAMS as a HUGE CRACK appears, traveling along the beneath her feet. The floor under their table is breaking away . Wood GROANS as the split grows wider... then with a deafe ROAR, the section of deck breaks away!

dialogues.speaker: MASTER
dialogues.text: We see it all as half of the party breaks away. The wood SQUEALS like a huge sequoia going down. Pylons crumble. T deck collapses into trash, taking dozens of victims with Multiple SPLASHES of people and debris send explosions of spray into the air.

dialogues.speaker: REGGIE
dialogues.text: Surfaces, sputtering for air just as a half ton of shatte wood SWATS him like a fly.  86.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie, at the helm, reacts to the sight of the collapsing deck... the SCREAMS of the partygoers.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Oh my god... Julie watches in stunned disbelief. Then she sees the TURBULENCE swirl about... sweeping towards the victims. S hits the gas and veers the boat around. UNDERWATER - PIRANHA P.O.V. Sonar defines dozens of swimmers thrashing in the water a more splash down.

dialogues.speaker: ALPHA FISH
dialogues.text: Leads the charge straight at the wide array of victims.

dialogues.speaker: THE WATER
dialogues.text: The piranhas strike! Horrified victims are dragged, kicki and SCREAMING beneath the surface as they water churns wi blood. SYDNEY’S TABLE Is on the very edge of a sheer drop, tilted at a radical angle. Sydney hangs on for dear life as less fortunates tumble by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two bolts EXPLODE off the table’s base. It swings out ove the edge as if on a hinge. Sydney clings to the table as it swings down... and jerks a halt, hanging upside down. She’s whiplashed off, SCREAM as she tumbles into darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Half-skeletal victims thrash in the churning water (CG an makeup FX). A victim who won’t give up, drags himself ont shore, covered in lashing piranhas. The lower part of his torso is missing! Sydney breaks surface in the foreground SCREAMING with half her face torn off.  87.

dialogues.speaker: THE LOOKING GLASS
dialogues.text: Dozens of panicked swimmers grab at the Looking Glass... on one side. Their weight threatens to capsize the boat.

dialogues.speaker: NATE
dialogues.text: No, no! Don’t do that...! J.C. grabs the gunnels for support. Julie GUNS the engine But the weight of the swimmers turns the boat in a tight circle... sending it across the wreckage.

dialogues.speaker: GLASS BOTTOM
dialogues.text: The twisted STEEL RODS of the stump of a pylon SCRAPES al the glass bottom of the boat... CRACKING the glass!

dialogues.speaker: THE BAR
dialogues.text: It hangs at forty-five degrees, literally swinging in the wind. Marcus is scared shitless, clinging to his swivel chair, one in the row bolted to the bar. He grabs a shot tequila as it slides by, sucks it down.

dialogues.speaker: CARRIE
dialogues.text: What’s happening, Marcus?!

dialogues.speaker: MARCUS
dialogues.text: (freaked out) I didn’t mean for anybody to get hurt, I...

dialogues.speaker: CARRIE
dialogues.text: What?! You knew this would happen?

dialogues.speaker: MARCUS
dialogues.text: No, I... Carrie grabs him by the collar and pulls him across the b

dialogues.speaker: CARRIE
dialogues.text: Talk to me, Marcus!

dialogues.speaker: MARCUS
dialogues.text: (starts to cry) The quake... it busted the pylons somehow . With an ominous GROAN, the bar tilts further.  88.

dialogues.speaker: CARRIE
dialogues.text: What the hell’s in the water?

dialogues.speaker: MARCUS
dialogues.text: I don’t know, swear to God...

dialogues.speaker: MARCUS LOOKS DOWN
dialogues.text: One of Lil’ John’s powerful spotlights is now pointing straight down. Carrie notices that the shadows of the piranha are avoidi the circle of light... scattering as it swings back and forth.

dialogues.speaker: CARRIE
dialogues.text: Whatever they are, they don’t like the light. Marcus now sees the Looking Glass, hung up on wreckage an surrounded by the mayhem.

dialogues.speaker: MARCUS
dialogues.text: Holy shit... Julie!

dialogues.speaker: WATER
dialogues.text: Lil’ John and two of his rap crew are stranded, clinging six by six chunk of debris. People are being torn to pieces all around them as their makeshift raft tilts/sinks. Piranhas swarm up the incline, leaping over one another t tear into Rap Crew #1 and #2. They tumble into the churni water, kicking and screaming. Lil’ John hangs onto the highest tip of the sinking wreck He pulls a 9MM out of the back of his pants and starts BLASTING away. LIL’ JOHN (freaking) I eat fish!!! Motha fuckin’ fish do NOT EAT ME! And, he’s actually a damn good shot, nailing leaping pira like a skeet shooter. BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! Then one SNAPS onto the wrist of his gun hand! Two more strike his throat like arrows and CHOMP DOWN, tails lashi  89. Lil’ John’s gun finger is still twitching, CLICKING on em chambers as a half-dozen piranha strike his bare, tattooe chest. Lil’ John finally collapses into the churning wate

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marcus stands on Carrie’s shoulders, climbing the side of building.

dialogues.speaker: MARCUS
dialogues.text: C’mon, hurry! She boosts him higher... Marcus gets a hand hold and pulls himself up to the power SPOTLIGHT mounted on an upper corner of the building. Marcus grabs hold and the spotlight FLARES into CAMERA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie guns the engines, but the boat is stuck solid. Water seeps through the cracks in the glass bottom boat. Rabid piranhas BUMP and THRASH against it, trying to get their victims. The weakened glass spiderwebs further

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Zack... get Ted! Nate looks back... the entire swarm is now heading for th boat.

dialogues.speaker: NATE
dialogues.text: There’s nowhere to go! Suddenly the glass bottom BURSTS! A fountain of piranha spouts up onto the deck. The boat is instantly flooded wi rising water and SNAPPING piranha. Julie drags Ted up on the narrow gunnel as the ship sinks Zack and J.C. scramble up to the highest point on the bow but they are all going down with the ship, no hope in sig

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Swim for it! Zack holds J.C.’s hand as they jump into the water. Julie eases Ted into the water, calls to Nate.  90.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Hurry! Nate takes a last look behind them. It’s too late. The swarm is almost upon them. They’1ll never make it to the shore. Julie plows through the waist-deep water dragging Ted... turns when she realizes that Nate isn’t behind them.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Nate?! Nate grabs one of the last waterproof flares in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: NATE
dialogues.text: (to Julie) Go! Get out of here! Nate turns back to the rear of the sinking boat. Julie ha no choice but to continue her race to the shore. Nate CRACKS the fuse cap on the flare as he fights his wa the rear of the boat. The bright blue/white FLARE is near blinding. A leaping Piranha strikes Nate in the shoulder, ripping d into the flesh. Another sinks its teeth into his forearm. Nate SCREAMS as blood gushes, but he’s reached his goal.. the big twin engines at the rear of the boat. Nate desperately twists off the gas cap. He takes a last look at the approaching swarm.

dialogues.speaker: NATE
dialogues.text: Sayonara, you little bastards. Nate jams the flare in the open tank just as the swarm reaches the boat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KA-THOOM! The half-submerged engine blows in a thunderous ball of fire... the second engine ignites a split second later. Julie turns back to see the boat rise up out of the water it’s blown to pieces... fire, spray and fish bits fill th air.

dialogues.speaker: THE SWARM
dialogues.text: It doubles back on itself as the fireball erupts. Nate ha given his life to buy his friends a few precious seconds.  91. Julie drags Ted as Zack helps J.C. thrash through the wat in a race to shore. The swarm regroups and is closing in fast! Julie stumbles into a floating corpse... nearly falls wit Ted in her arms.

dialogues.speaker: ZACK
dialogues.text: Julie! The foremost row of piranhas reaches her, leaping up out the water. Suddenly a BLINDING LIGHT pierces the darkness flaring off the water all around them.

dialogues.speaker: REVERSE
dialogues.text: It’s Lil’ John’s spotlights! Marcus and Carrie man the tw monster ARC LIGHTS, focusing them on our heroes. The swarm scatters, but swirls threateningly just beyond ring of light. Our heroes suddenly have a chance.

dialogues.speaker: MARCUS
dialogues.text: (yells)

dialogues.speaker: FOLLOW THE LIGHT
dialogues.text: Julie carries Ted through the waist-deep water. Zack protects J.C. as the angelic shaft of light surrounds the Piranha thrash a few yards away, angry at losing their me

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A dying victim clutches at Julie. She doesn’t pause, but drags Ted straight up the incline, until they are far fro harm’s way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zack and J.C. scramble to safety as a fire truck pulls up the B.G. Firemen rush to help others still struggling to out of the water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie drops to her knees, exhausted, as she finally reach safety. She carefully eases Ted back onto the soft grass. He looks as if he’s close to death. His voice is a barely audible rasp.  92.

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: ...-help me. Julie pulls him closer.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: What... what can I do? Ted raises his arm, looking beyond Julie. She realizes he pointing to something behind her. We hear an unsettling electronic HUM... growing louder and louder. Julie turns. JULIE’S P.O.V. A large TRAILER is the source of the humming, a heavy-dut gas powered GENERATOR attached to the back of Lil’ John’s equipment truck. It’s the power source for all his lights and amps... parked only a few yards away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie looks from the gennie, back down the embankment. It directly in line with the swarm, which is in a feeding fr on the remains of dozens of victims.

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: ..kill them. Kill them all. Julie helps Ted rise. He leans heavily on her as they mak it to the gennie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marcus and Carrie hurry down to Nate and J.C. Firemen ten to victims in the B.G.

dialogues.speaker: MARCUS
dialogues.text: Where’s Julie?

dialogues.speaker: C.U.
dialogues.text: Ted’s fingers travel down the row of switches, flicking t all to MAX. We hear the generator’s engine REV loudly in response. The gauges hit red, over a hundred thousand vol Ted, with great effort, manages to stand on his own two f He grabs the latch on the trailer hitch, but it won’t bud

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: (to Julie) ...do it.  93. Julie SLAMS open the trailer hitch.

dialogues.speaker: ZACK
dialogues.text: As he realizes what Julie is about to attempt

dialogues.speaker: ZACK
dialogues.text: (softly) My god...

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: She throws her weight behind the trailer. Smoke pours out the overheating generator. The tires slowly start to roll down the embankment.

dialogues.speaker: THE SURVIVORS
dialogues.text: Everyone’s attention is drawn to the huge generator as it CRASHES through the brush, picking up speed.

dialogues.speaker: MASTER
dialogues.text: The generator hits the curb of the retaining wall at full speed. Does a half-flip, up and over... Beat. There is a deafening CLAP OF THUNDER and a blinding FLASH electricity as the half-ton generator hits the surface of water. A spiderweb of CRACKLING electrical energy dances across inlet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A_ shuttering ELECTRONIC PULSE rips through the entire sw

dialogues.speaker: ALPHA FISH
dialogues.text: Alpha Fish’s eyes EXPLODE as the arc of power blazes thro him

dialogues.speaker: THE GENERATOR
dialogues.text: It’s a flickering light show as it sinks to the bottom of lake. It shorts out in a final eruption of fiery bubbles.  94.

dialogues.speaker: THE SURFACE
dialogues.text: Beat. One by one, the corpses of the piranha bob to the surface... dozens... hundreds.

dialogues.speaker: THE EMBANKMENT
dialogues.text: Julie looks to Ted, the exuberance of their victory lifti her from exhaustion. Ted manages a weary smile.

dialogues.speaker: TED
dialogues.text: It worked... Julie embraces him; tucking her head into his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: MARCUS
dialogues.text: He gingerly picks a smoking piranha carcass up by the tai

dialogues.speaker: MARCUS
dialogues.text: Check it out... any of you mother fuckers bring tartar sauce? Marcus takes a big crunchy bite out of the piranha’s flan

dialogues.speaker: EMBANKMENT
dialogues.text: Julie and Ted appear on the edge of the embankment, gazin down at their handy work.

dialogues.speaker: CAMERA BOOMS UP
dialogues.text: From the C.U. of Julie’s haunted, exhausted gaze... wider over the embankment as Zack runs into frame, embracing hi brother... wider as J.C. puts a jacket over Julie’s shoul and firemen step in to help. Ambulances and police cars finally begin to arrive. END FRAME reveals the entire inlet, with the fallen remai of the deck, dozens of half-eaten bodies... and hundreds fish carcasses floating on the calm surface of Lake Havas FADE OUT.
